execution_plan.description: Find orders that contain at least two distinct products and return their IDs and order dates.
execution_plan.query: SELECT o.order_id, o.date_order_placed FROM Orders o JOIN Order_Items oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id GROUP BY o.order_id, o.date_order_placed HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT oi.product_id) >= 2;
